rev.desc.rev.desc: Modification made for DevTX Incident Ticket I0235.
Modified the routine that builds the list of options that the user can select from for Self-Service Starting Page as follows:
. Eliminate the option to Logout (it does not make sense that the user logs out as soon as they log in)
. Added the option to Display the ESS Menu (this is assigned a dummy option of 0)

descript.descript: Modification made for DevTX Incident Ticket I0235.
Modified the routine that builds the list of options that the user can select from for Self-Service Starting Page as follows:
. Eliminate the option to Logout (it does not make sense that the user logs out as soon as they log in)
. Added the option to Display the ESS Menu (this is assigned a dummy option of 0)
